title: large wires
extract: Solid wires have only one conductive strand and are much more difficult to move or bend. They are typically used when a lot of movement isn't necessary or when the wire is small (see figure 1). Stranded wires contain a large number of thin solid wires that are wrapped around each other to make a single larger wire.May 11, 2018
extract_html: Solid wires have only one conductive strand and are much more difficult to move or bend. Stranded wires contain a large number of thin solid wires that are wrapped around each other to make a single larger wire.May 11, 2018
